bug.short_desc: NPE retrieving context when attachment creation date is null

long_desc.thetext:
If the connector returns null for attachment creation date, right clicking a task and selecting a retrieve context throws an NPE.
Error Mon Nov 21 16:41:52 PST 2011 Unhandled event loop exception
java.lang.NullPointerException at com.ibm.icu.util.Calendar.setTime(Calendar.java:1979) at com.ibm.icu.text.DateFormat.format(DateFormat.java:482) at com.ibm.icu.text.DateFormat.format(DateFormat.java:494) at org.eclipse.mylyn.internal.context.ui.wizards.ContextRetrieveWizardPage.createControl(ContextRetrieveWizardPage.java:122) at Thanks, that needs to get fixed.
Fixed in 207ef5609ada028553de12b96a5dcd623eb5271e. I have applied the fix to master as well.
